p: Wang et al. ( 2020) and Zhou et al. ( 2020) have developed a series of extended SIR models by introducing time‐varying transmission rate, quarantine process and asymptomatic immunisation process (details in Section 5.2). The proposed methods have been established in an open‐source r package eSIR, available on GitHub ( https://github.com/lilywang1988/eSIR). This package calls rjags to generate MCMC chains and retains a few MCMC controllers from rjags. The package is also updated weekly with new summarised US state‐level count data for the COVID‐19 pandemic.
